content.question:
©bpk Bildagentur/Ethnologisches Museum/Waltraut Schneider-Schütz/Art Resource, NY

The artist who created the Benin bronze wall plaque from Oba’s palace used which of the following techniques to show the importance of the Oba?

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
